target.name: _classpath-open
target.description: Internal target, please do not use manually. Creates first part for .classpath.
target.echo:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- This Eclipse .classpath file has been generated by the kickstart.xml Ant script. Please do not edit unless you know what you are doing. It will be overwritten each time you run kickstart.xml, depending on your local OS and architecture settings.
This file should have been created by running the default target from kickstart.xml, however other targets may be also used on demand.
If you encounter this file is not working properly with Eclipse, please double check if it is syntactically correct, and then please file a bug report to Zoltan Kovacs <zoltan@geogebra.org> by sending the generated .classpath file and the used target. Thanks!
-->
<classpath>
<classpathentry excluding="build/|icons/|installer/|lib/|scripts/|webstart/|xsd/" kind="src" path=""> <attributes> <attribute name="org.eclipse.jdt.launching.CLASSPATH_ATTR_LIBRARY_PATH_ENTRY" value="desktop/lib"/> </attributes> </classpathentry>
<classpathentry kind="con" path="org.eclipse.jdt.launching.JRE_CONTAINER"/> <classpathentry combineaccessrules="false" kind="src" path="/common"/> <classpathentry kind="lib" path="lib/build/lib_jsobject.jar"/> <classpathentry kind="lib" path="lib/build/lib_mac_extensions.jar"/> <classpathentry kind="lib" path="lib/jlatexmath.jar"/> <classpathentry kind="lib" path="lib/jlm_greek.jar"/> <classpathentry kind="lib" path="lib/jlm_cyrillic.jar"/> <classpathentry kind="lib" path="lib/OpenGeoProver.jar"/> <classpathentry kind="lib" path="lib/jna-4.1.0.jar"/> <classpathentry kind="src" path="/jogl${jogl}"/> <classpathentry kind="src" path="/noInput3D"/>
